title: Russian ministry of defense reports Air defense shot down 35 drones overnight, 17 in Krasnodar Krai, 4 in Moscow and Yaroslav...
content: Russian ministry of defense reports Air defense shot down 35 drones overnight, 17 in Krasnodar Krai, 4 in Moscow and Yaroslav regions each, 3 in Kursk region, 3 in Belgorod region, 2 in Kaluga region and in Rostov and Oryol regions
author: Live UA Map
